summary: This document is a custody account opening form for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank Private Wealth Management. It includes details about the account, tax information, and various affiliations related to Epstein's financial management.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the custody account being opened at Deutsche Bank, with multiple mentions throughout the document.

persons.name: Arthur Tendler
persons.context: Arthur Tendler is mentioned as a strategic wealth advisor associated with Epstein's account management.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is listed as a custody officer involved in the account setup for Epstein.

persons.name: Katy Cheng
persons.context: Katy Cheng is mentioned as an account assistant in relation to Epstein's custody account.

persons.name: Prashant Mahendru
persons.context: Prashant Mahendru is noted as the reviewer of the account opening form on the date it was processed.

persons.name: Dhruv Yadav
persons.context: Dhruv Yadav is mentioned as the approver of the account opening form for Epstein.

connections.description: Arthur Tendler is a strategic wealth advisor managing Epstein's custody account.
Paul Morris is a custody officer involved in the management of Epstein's account.
Katy Cheng is an account assistant working on Epstein's custody account.
Prashant Mahendru reviewed the account opening form, which was then approved by Dhruv Yadav.

events.title: Account Opening
events.description: The custody account for Jeffrey Epstein was officially opened at Deutsche Bank.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands, 00802
keyFacts: The document is a custody account opening form for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank.
The account was opened on April 10, 2014.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a U.S. taxpayer with a legal address in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Multiple staff members are involved in the management and approval of Epstein's account.
The document contains confidential information and is marked as such under federal rules.
